member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveGitHubWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving GitHub WebHooks. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_GitHub' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/github/{id}'. For details about GitHub WebHooks, see https://developer.github.com/webhooks/.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.Receiver_BadHeaderEncoding
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' header value is invalid. It must be a valid hex-encoded string..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.Receiver_BadHeaderValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid '{0}' header value. Expecting a value of '{1}={2}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.Receiver_NoEvent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The WebHook request must contain a '{0}' HTTP header indicating the type of event..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.GitHubReceiverResources.Receiver_PingEvent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Received a GitHub Ping Event -- ignoring..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.GitHubWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by GitHub. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_GitHub' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/github/{id}'. For details about GitHub WebHooks, see https://developer.github.com/webhooks/.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.GitHubWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.GitHubWebHookReceiver.VerifySignature(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature header matches that of the actual body.
